description: Our archives feature a wide range of subjects covering many aspects of our organisation and London's transport history.

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Our archives feature a wide range of subjects covering many aspects of our organisation and London's transport history."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Our archive collections include:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Annual reports and accounts","Capital projects records","Chief officer's correspondence and papers","Corporate policies","Major incidents and enquiries records","Minutes and papers of Boards and Committees of TfL, its predecessors, and subsidiary companies","Safety audit records","Patents and design records","Property deeds","Staff clubs and events records","Staff magazines","Staff registers"]}

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Top 20 highlights of the collections in detail","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/top-20-package.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 7.15MB","image":{}},{"title":"Cataloguing report 2016-2017","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/cataloguing-report-2016-2017.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 3.66MB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

Although we hold a number of staff registers, few of them contain more than a name, badge number, work location and work start date. They rarely contain addresses or extensive information about an individual's work records, although they might sometimes contain comments or details about pay rises, but this is unusual.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Research guides"}
If you'd like to find out more about a particular archive subject, these introductory research guides will help:
